name: Climb (itch) (udreif)
description:
Climb is a short game about a mountain and the people that climb it . A game by udreif and 4lfonsohh made for the lux Jam gamejam

Do play with low volume, as the audio can be kind of loud. Thanks for playing

Credits:

4lfonsohh - Art / Programming

udreif - Lead Programmer 

Music - Waves and Walls by Martin cee (softmartin)
